description:
Programmable menu.  Note that each function you call must be a named global function, hence the need to mark each function with the # rpn: export directive.

It may be possible in the future to call local functions without exposing them to the global namespace.
source:
def ui1():
  "blah1"
  KEYG(1, "blah1")
  "blah2"
  KEYG(2, "blah2")
  MENU()

def blah1():  # rpn: export
  print('you chose blah1')

def blah2():  # rpn: export
  print('you chose blah2')
title: Menu
